products.title: Hand-rolled Fork
products.description: This traditional hand fork is an essential tool for any gardening enthusiast.

products.title: Onion Hoe
products.description: This tool is versatile, perfect for leveling the ground and loosening soil in various situations.

products.title: Weeding Pick
products.description: This weeding pick is ideal for removing fine weeds from brick joints and other tight spaces.

products.title: Garden Insect Trap
products.description: This device hangs from tree branches or in the garden to capture pests. Simply place fruit or other bait at the bottom to attract them.

products.title: Attractant Jute Twine
products.description: This jute twine is essential for home gardening and is available in a variety of colors.

products.title: Rubber Gloves
products.description: These gloves feature a rubber-coated surface for enhanced grip and shock absorption during work.

products.title: Seed Storage Bag
products.description: A bag for storing harvested seeds. Conveniently sized like a small pouch, available in a pack of 20.

products.title: Microfiber Cloth
products.description: Made of highly absorbent microfiber, it effectively removes dirt without the need for detergents.
